title: Sustainably Living
text:
What encompasses sustainability?
In my daily life, four main categories came to mind when I think of sustainability.  The first being eating. This encompasses all aspects related to food. The next category is creating. There could have been many names for this section, but this portrays it the best. Third, we have learning. Arguably the most important category. Lastly, we have reusing. This is fairly common, and may be what most people think of when they think sustainability. Click on each category to explore the best ways to maximize these areas of your life!

title: Passionate about sharing tips and tricks on everything that helps me live a more sustainable life.
text: In 2019, “Skip the straw, save the turtles,” was the phrase circling the internet. This sparked my interest and became the topic that shaped my high school experience. Once I got to college, I found many environmental roles that I quickly became immersed in. Having explored many fields throughout my time as an undergraduate, I have decided to pursue a future in law. Click the button below to read more about my journey and hear how I got to where I am today!

title: Eating
text:
We must eat to live, however, in what ways can we limit the waste produced from this activity? Whether that is reusing food scraps or maximizing the resources we have, there are many ways to limit waste. 












Eating Post One

title: Reusing
text:
Part of the reduce, reuse, recycle trinity, reusing encompasses taking items we all inevitably have and expanding their purpose. This may be giving them a new purpose or exploring the multifaceted use of some items, all while minimizing waste.












Reusing Post One






Ally Olsen


Feb 4, 2024

title: Creating
text:
